target_markets.market_description: Small to medium-sized businesses (5-500 employees) that don't understand AI yet
pain_points: want to use AI but don't know how
target_markets.market_size_indicators: 62% of jobs in America are created by small businesses with 5-500 employees

problems_validated.problem: Enormous gap between small to medium businesses that desperately need AI to stay competitive and their ability to actually implement it
problems_validated.severity: Critical - businesses are 'starving' for these services
problems_validated.current_solutions: Limited or no current solutions mentioned
problems_validated.market_gap: Businesses don't understand AI yet and need help with implementation and execution

products_tools.name: ChatGPT
products_tools.use_case: Large language model for business automation and AI implementation

products_tools.name: Gemini
products_tools.use_case: Large language model alternative to ChatGPT

business_strategies.strategy: AI automation agency model - work with businesses on contract or retainer basis to help them apply AI technologies
business_strategies.implementation: Help businesses understand and implement AI tools, focus on education and execution rather than just consulting
business_strategies.expected_results: Multi-million dollar business potential - creator built business on track for $10 million revenue
business_strategies.case_study: Creator built multi-million dollar business with 40+ employees in Oakland, New Zealand office

problems_solutions.problem: Businesses need help understanding and implementing AI but don't know where to start
problems_solutions.solution: Start AI automation agency helping businesses implement AI tools like ChatGPT
steps: Work on contract or retainer basis

startup_ideas.idea: AI automation agency helping small businesses implement AI tools
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Gap between businesses needing AI and ability to implement it
startup_ideas.business_model: Contract or retainer-based services for AI implementation
startup_ideas.validation: Billionaires Kevin O'Leary and Mark Cuban recommend this business model
startup_ideas.investment_needed: Low - needs no products, no fancy marketing, no coding skills

growth_tactics.tactic: Build AI YouTube channel and community
growth_tactics.results_expected: Creator built biggest AI YouTube channel and community with 160,000+ members

ai_workflows.use_case: Help businesses automate their systems and processes with AI technology

trends_signals.trend: AI adoption gap in small-medium businesses
trends_signals.opportunity: Massive opportunity as billionaires are 'begging people to start these kinds of businesses'

actionable_quotes.quote: I think everything is looking at AI now. I would go to businesses because businesses don't understand AI yet.
actionable_quotes.context: Kevin O'Leary explaining what business he'd start if he were 25 today
actionable_quotes.actionability: Target businesses that need AI help

actionable_quotes.quote: It's not about how hard you row, it's about what bill you're at.
actionable_quotes.actionability: Choose the right market/opportunity rather than just working harder

actionable_quotes.quote: You need to be curious because everything's changing. You need to be agile because everything's changing. And you've got to be able to adapt because everything's always changing.
actionable_quotes.context: Mark Cuban on skills needed for success
actionable_quotes.actionability: Develop adaptability and curiosity as core skills

key_statistics.statistic: 62% of jobs in America are created by small businesses with 5-500 employees
key_statistics.context: Explaining the size of the target market for AI services

key_statistics.statistic: $10 million revenue target for this year
